net.sf.jasperreports.engine

Interface JRStaticText

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, JRAlignment, JRBoxContainer, JRChild, JRCloneable, JRCommonElement, JRCommonText, JRElement, JRFont, JRIdentifiable, JRParagraphContainer, JRPropertiesHolder, JRStyleContainer, JRTextElement, JRVisitable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JRBaseStaticText, JRDesignStaticText, JRFillStaticText

    public interface JRStaticText
extends JRTextElement
    An abstract representation of a report static text. It provides functionality for static texts.
    Version:
    $Id: JRStaticText.java 5878 2013-01-07 20:23:13Z teodord $
    Author:
    Teodor Danciu (teodord@users.sourceforge.net)
